|vendor_id = 14e4 |device_id = 43a0 |subvendor_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |subdevice_id = <!-- Leave blank for none --> |id_string = <!-- PnP ID string --> |windosid = <!-- Windows ID, Leave blank for none --> |fcc_id = QDS-BRCM1082 |icid = 4324A-BRCM1082 |boardid = <!-- Board ID --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id --> |oui = 54:27:1E

|availability = reference design |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = 06/16/2014 |estreldate = <!-- Estimated release date --> |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country = <!-- ASIN country --> |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |country = <!-- Country device was manufactured in -->

}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== The antenna connector shown and specified in the FCC test report is ''IPEX A13''.
{{FCC ST|11/11/2014}}
